Translations.Text: Al-Ladhina Kafaru Wa Saddu `An Sabili Allahi 'Ađalla 'A`malahum
Wa Al-Ladhina 'Amanu Wa `Amilu As-Salihati Wa 'Amanu Bima Nuzzila `Ala Muhammadin Wa Huwa Al-Haqqu Min Rabbihim Kaffara `Anhum Sayyi'atihim Wa 'Aslaha Balahum
Dhalika Bi'anna Al-Ladhina Kafaru Attaba`u Al-Batila Wa 'Anna Al-Ladhina 'Amanu Attaba`u Al-Haqqa Min Rabbihim Kadhalika Yađribu Allahu Lilnnasi 'Amthalahum

Fa'idha Laqitumu Al-Ladhina Kafaru Fađarba Ar-Riqabi Hatta 'Idha 'Athkhantumuhum Fashuddu Al-Wathaqa Fa'imma Mannaan Ba`du Wa 'Imma Fida'an Hatta Tađa`a Al-Harbu 'Awzaraha Dhalika Wa Law Yasha'u Allahu Lantasara Minhum Wa Lakin Liyabluwa Ba`đakum Biba`đin Wa Al-Ladhina Qutilu Fi Sabili Allahi Falan Yuđilla 'A`malahum
Sayahdihim Wa Yuslihu Balahum
Wa Yudkhiluhumu Al-Jannata `Arrafaha Lahum
Ya 'Ayyuha Al-Ladhina 'Amanu 'In Tansuru Allaha Yansurkum Wa Yuthabbit 'Aqdamakum
Wa Al-Ladhina Kafaru Fata`saan Lahum Wa 'Ađalla 'A`malahum
Dhalika Bi'annahum Karihu Ma 'Anzala Allahu Fa'ahbata 'A`malahum
Afalam Yasiru Fi Al-'Arđi Fayanzuru Kayfa Kana `Aqibatu Al-Ladhina Min Qablihim Dammara Allahu `Alayhim Wa Lilkafirina 'Amthaluha
Dhalika Bi'anna Allaha Mawla Al-Ladhina 'Amanu Wa 'Anna Al-Kafirina La Mawla Lahum
Inna Allaha Yudkhilu Al-Ladhina 'Amanu Wa `Amilu As-Salihati Jannatin Tajri Min Tahtiha Al-'Anharu Wa Al-Ladhina Kafaru Yatamatta`una Wa Ya'kuluna Kama Ta'kulu Al-'An`am Wa An-Naru Mathwaan Lahum
Wa Ka'ayyin Min Qaryatin Hiya 'Ashaddu Quwatan Min Qaryatika Allati 'Akhrajatka 'Ahlaknahum Fala Nasira Lahum
Afaman Kana `Ala Bayyinatin Min Rabbihi Kaman Zuyyina Lahu Su'u `Amalihi Wa Attaba`u 'Ahwa'ahum

Mathalu Al-Jannati Allati Wu`ida Al-Muttaquna Fiha 'Anharun Min Ma'in Ghayri 'Asinin Wa 'Anharun Min Labanin Lam Yataghayyar Ta`muhu Wa 'Anharun Min Khamrin Ladhatin Lilsharibina Wa 'Anharun Min `Asalin Musaffaan Wa Lahum Fiha Min Kulli Ath-Thamarati Wa Maghfiratun Min Rabbihim Kaman Huwa Khalidun Fi An-Nari Wa Suqu Ma'an Hamimaan Faqatta`a 'Am`a'ahum
Wa Minhum Man Yastami`u 'Ilayka Hatta 'Idha Kharaju Min `Indika Qalu Lilladhina 'Utu Al-`Ilma Madha Qala 'Anifaan 'Ula'ika Al-Ladhina Taba`a Allahu `Ala Qulubihim Wa Attaba`u 'Ahwa'ahum
Wa Al-Ladhina Ahtadaw Zadahum Hudaan Wa 'Atahum Taqwhum
Fahal Yanzuruna 'Illa As-Sa`ata 'An Ta'tiyahum Baghtatan Faqad Ja'a 'Ashratuha Fa'anna Lahum 'Idha Ja'at/hum Dhikrahum
Fa`lam 'Annahu La 'Ilaha 'Illa Allahu Wa Astaghfir Lidhanbika Wa Lilmu'uminina Wa Al-Mu'uminati Wa Allahu Ya`lamu Mutaqallabakum Wa Mathwakum

Wa Yaqulu Al-Ladhina 'Amanu Lawla Nuzzilat Suratun Fa'idha 'Unzilat Suratun Muhkamatun Wa Dhukira Fiha Al-Qitalu Ra'ayta Al-Ladhina Fi Qulubihim Marađun Yanzuruna 'Ilayka Nazara Al-Maghshiyi `Alayhi Mina Al-Mawti Fa'awla Lahum
Ta`atun Wa Qawlun Ma`rufun Fa'idha `Azama Al-'Amru Falaw Sadaqu Allaha Lakana Khayraan Lahum
Fahal `Asaytum 'In Tawallaytum 'An Tufsidu Fi Al-'Arđi Wa Tuqatti`u 'Arhamakum
Ula'ika Al-Ladhina La`anahumu Allahu Fa'asammahum Wa 'A`ma 'Absarahum
Afala Yatadabbaruna Al-Qur'ana 'Am `Ala Qulubin 'Aqfaluha
Inna Al-Ladhina Artaddu `Ala 'Adbarihim Min Ba`di Ma Tabayyana Lahumu Al-Huda Ash-Shaytanu Sawwala Lahum Wa 'Amla Lahum
Dhalika Bi'annahum Qalu Lilladhina Karihu Ma Nazzala Allahu Sanuti`ukum Fi Ba`đi Al-'Amri Wa Allahu Ya`lamu 'Israrahum
Fakayfa 'Idha Tawaffat/humu Al-Mala'ikatu Yađribuna Wujuhahum Wa 'Adbarahum
Dhalika Bi'annahumu Attaba`u Ma 'Askhata Allaha Wa Karihu Riđwanahu Fa'ahbata 'A`malahum
Am Hasiba Al-Ladhina Fi Qulubihim Marađun 'An Lan Yukhrija Allahu 'Ađghanahum
Wa Law Nasha'u La'araynakahum Fala`araftahum Bisimahum Wa Lata`rifannahum Fi Lahni Al-Qawli Wa Allahu Ya`lamu 'A`malakum
Wa Lanabluwannakum Hatta Na`lama Al-Mujahidina Minkum Wa As-Sabirina Wa Nabluwa 'Akhbarakum
Inna Al-Ladhina Kafaru Wa Saddu `An Sabili Allahi Wa Shaqqu Ar-Rasula Min Ba`di Ma Tabayyana Lahumu Al-Huda Lan Yađurru Allaha Shay'aan Wa Sayuhbitu 'A`malahum
Ya 'Ayyuha Al-Ladhina 'Amanu 'Ati`u Allaha Wa 'Ati`u Ar-Rasula Wa La Tubtilu 'A`malakum
Inna Al-Ladhina Kafaru Wa Saddu `An Sabili Allahi Thumma Matu Wa Hum Kuffarun Falan Yaghfira Allahu Lahum
Fala Tahinu Wa Tad`u 'Ila As-Salmi Wa 'Antumu Al-'A`lawna Wa Allahu Ma`akum Wa Lan Yatirakum 'A`malakum
Innama Al-Hayaatu Ad-Dunya La`ibun Wa Lahwun Wa 'In Tu'uminu Wa Tattaqu Yu'utikum 'Ujurakum Wa La Yas'alkum 'Amwalakum
In Yas'alkumuha Fayuhfikum Tabkhalu Wa Yukhrij 'Ađghanakum

Ha'antum Ha'uula' Tud`awna Litunfiqu Fi Sabili Allahi Faminkum Man Yabkhalu Wa Man Yabkhal Fa'innama Yabkhalu `An Nafsihi Wa Allahu Al-Ghaniyu Wa 'Antumu Al-Fuqara'u Wa 'In Tatawallaw Yastabdil Qawmaan Ghayrakum Thumma La Yakunu 'Amthalakum
